Reviews.Title: “Well located in a quiet neighbourhood, large room, terrible beds”
Reviews.Author: NatureGalIsrael
Reviews.Content: hotel located quiet neighbourhood centre 20 minutes foot close tram stop takes key city 3 bathroom pretty clean bad heating didnt 5 nights stay complaining couple times changed beds terribly uncomfortable mattress extra soft broken springs worst bed slept breakfast ok expect european hotels concluding ok value money taking consideration hotels amsterdam incredibly expensive
